mapper.insert: insert into exchange_record (cst_create, cst_modified, job_id, original_user_id, target_user_id, is_accepted) values (current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(), #{jobId}, #{originalUserId}, #{targetUserId}, #{accepted});
mapper.update: update exchange_record set job_id = #{jobId}, original_user_id = #{originalUserId}, target_user_id = #{targetUserId}, is_accepted = #{accepted}, cst_modified = current_timestamp() where id = #{id} and is_deleted = false;
